description:
Natsumi competes to be radio DJ 623`s assistant for a day, but she has stiff competition in the form of the somewhat disguised frogs. Then, after Natsumi confiscates Keroro`s new plastic model as a punishment, he sics a smaller but stronger robotic version of himself on her... but the mini-Keroro seems to have its own ideas about world domination!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 623 僕のラジオにでない? であります / ケロロVS夏美 1/6ガチンコバトル! であります
I Don`t Have A Radio? / Keroro vs Natsumi 1/6 Gachinko Battle!
Tu veux passer dans mon émission radio ? / Combat à petite échelle
